name: FireEscape
description:
For T-shirt Game Hosted by TEAM NOMNOM Games SEP18

 https://itch.io/jam/t-shirt-jam- 

A fire has broken loose! There's not much to burn in this Metal building, and the oxygen is running out!

You'll die if you spread your fire too much, plan your movements wisely. 

~~Controls: ~~

WASD or arrows to move. The flame can only spread on walls

You can hold "Space" to drop from the ceiling-

TIP: Moving over your own flame trail makes you go faster

Programming: C#, Unity3D- Wander "This couldn't run any worse if both it's legs were broken"

Art: GIMP - Wander  "What do you mean we need art assets?"

Music: Beepbox.co - Wander  "Gosh, I wish there was a mute button"


Single developer, used Free Unity Particle Assets
